testsuite.name: test.skillUpdateTest

testcase.name: skillUpdationTest
testcase.system-out: Skills module is initiated Skills module is validated successfully

testsuite.system-out: STEP 1: Initiating profile update module STEP 2: Clicking on the menu (three dots) STEP 3: Checking and hiding chat window if present ✔ No chat window found to hide STEP 4: Clicking on 'View & Update Profile' STEP 5: Waiting for any loading overlays to disappear ✔ Loader disappeared, proceeding STEP 6: Scrolling to the 'Delete Resume' icon ✔ Scrolled to the element successfully STEP 7: Clicking the 'Delete Resume' icon STEP 8: Clicking the confirmation 'Delete' button on popup ✔ Resume successfully deleted STEP 9: Clicking 'Upload Resume' button STEP 10: Uploading new resume ✔ Resume uploaded successfully Resume Headline module is initiated Resume headline module is validated successfully Skills module is initiated Skills module is validated successfully
